fplR
  • Reference
  • Articles

Detailed data for a user's player picks for a gameweek in the current FPL season

Returns a tibble containing player data for a given user's selection for a gameweek during the current FPL season.

userPicks(user_id, gameweek)

Arguments

user_id

FPL user ID (retrieve from the corresponding user's https://fantasy.premierleague.com team page URL).
gameweek

FPL competition gameweek (1-38).

Examples

userPicks(user_id = 123, gameweek = 10)
#> # A tibble: 15 x 57
#>    round fixture element position player_name   player_team
#>  * <int>   <int>   <int>    <int>       <chr>         <chr>
#>  1    10      92     450        1      Adrián       Everton
#>  2    10      97       3        2   Koscielny    Sunderland
#>  3    10      94     278        3      Gibson   Bournemouth
#>  4    10     100     436        4     McAuley      Man City
#>  5    10      91     104        5        Dann     Liverpool
#>  6    10      97      12        6     Sánchez    Sunderland
#>  7    10      96     333        7     Shaqiri       Swansea
#>  8    10      98     402        8         Son     Leicester
#>  9    10      95     314        9      Austin       Chelsea
#> 10    10      95      97       10       Costa   Southampton
#> 11    10      92     143       11      Lukaku      West Ham
#> 12    10     100     430       12      Foster      Man City

#> 14    10      94      42       14   Stanislas Middlesbrough
